question:
You are taking a course at a local college. The deadline for your project was last week but you haven't finished it.

Write a letter to your lecturer. In your letter

introduce yourself
explain why you haven't handed in the project yet
request more time to do it.
text: My name is Burak Bayrak attending the course of Artificial Intelligent at Istanbul College for six months. I am writing to express my sincere apologies for not handling to deliver my project in due time. However, I have got some excuses for delaying this issue.

First of all, please let you know I have been preparing for the task since I had get appalling news from my family.Unfortunately, my uncle died in a traffic accident two weeks ago and for that , the reason I had to attend his funeral in no time.After then stay a couple of days with my extended family for emotional support. Therefore, I could not have a chance to study nevertheless, more or less %70 of the work had been finished. In order that I guess  within five ,days I would be able to finalize my project by all means.

In as much as I request from you extra working time to submit my work and would be grateful if you permit for as well as minimum five working days. Namely, I am sure that when you check it would it appreciate.
I am looking forward to hearing from you
